document.full_text: the pilot of a plane carrying former senator ted stevens was apparently in control of the aircraft and trying to climb just before it slammed into a mountain slope, killing stevens and four others, according to files released on thursday.
document.title: pilot in control when senator ted stevens plane crashed: report
lines_and_colors: the pilot of a plane carrying former senator ted stevens was apparently in control of the aircraft and trying to climb just before it slammed into a mountain slope, killing stevens and four others, according to files released on thursday.
